description:
Returns a paginated list of all comments that were made on the
specified issue.

parameters.description: This can either be the username or the UUID of the user, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{user UUID}`.
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{repository UUID}`.
parameters.name: repo_slug

parameters.description: Query string to narrow down the response as per [filtering and sorting](../../../../../../meta/filtering).
parameters.name: q

200.description: A paginated list of issue comments.
